about_the_game:
Unearther is a 2D sandbox game focused on exploration and adventure. Inspired by famous sandbox games.

Journey into the unknown earth in search of resources. Make tools and equipments to survive the dangers and lurking monsters. Craft your way of living and discover the unknown world hidden in plain sight.

Become an adventurer and explore the mysterious world, fighting off the evils or just chilling and making yourself a house or whatever.

  • Sandbox. You have the freedom to build and break things.

  • Procedural Generated World. Take your time to explore the world filled with different biomes and environments.

  • Discover Caves and Dungeons. Find hidden treasures, mine ores, fighting the foes and get stronger.

  • Survival. While this game isn't focused on hardcore gameplay. But we have some elements that give you some challenges to survive. Such as hunger, temperature, breakable tools, etc. Each could be toggled to fit your preferred play style.

  • Crafting. Gather resources. Craft your tools, armors and make yourself stronger or make items and tiles, decorations at your benefits.

  • Multiplayer. It's always more fun to play with your friends and you can certainly do that here. (Supports multiplayer up to 8 players.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU with Hyper-threading or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
